OOC: ok rather then just send another annoying OOC im sending an OOC 
and an IC post seeing so I can kill 2 birds with one stone. Alright 
Dewboy, I only voted on that dumb poll to see who voted for who. I 
would cancel my vote entirely but polls dont do that unfortunately. 
Now for the IC.

BIC:
Frostbite recieves Zardus's com and then sends one back.

Frostbite: "Very well. I shall be arriving at our meeting area 
shortly and will wait for you. I thank you for letting me know of 
your delay."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
>  O.k. I admit that I had some rude polls, but thats no reason for 
> everyone to gang up on me and say Mustex had such a bad idea of 
> fusing sparks(and legendarynemisis is crazy if he thinks Rhesus is 
> going to take on Megaton).
